DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective show efficacy olanzapine non-inferior conventional antipsychotic haloperidol zuclopentixol treatment acute manic mixed episode bipolar disorder . Efficacy define time remission , measure total score Young Mania Rating Scale ( Y-MRS ) , MADRS-S , Clinical Global Impression - Bipolar ( CGI-BP ) . Time baseline remission define primary efficacy measure . Remission define Y-MRS score < =12 AND MADRS-S score < =12 AND CGI-BP = 1 2 . Secondary efficacy assessment include time baseline - Response , define reduction Y-MRS score great equal 50 % compare baseline - Relapse mania , define Y-MRS score > = 16 AND CGI-BP > 2 meet criterion remission - Switch depression , define MADRS-S score > =17 AND fulfil criterion Major Depression self-assessed DSRS .
